Spirit V3.10 (Boost V1.78.0)

  • Fortified against min and max macros. GH#697
  • Producing a variant attribute in an alternative parser branch was leading to a compilation error when parsed into a superset variant attribute due to swapped parameters to is_substitute trait. GH#702 GH#701 GH#679
